actions.desc: The forest marauder makes two boar spear attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit:16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the forest marauder can choose to push the target 10 feet away if it fails a DC 16 Strength saving throw.
actions.name: Boar Spear

actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Rock

special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the forest marauder has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
